title: 求发个粘土士兵！！！！
author: Yihc
txt_content: 我的版本是1.2.5我找了好久  即使找到了安装了在列表中 也找不到！！求神童发发！！并说明怎么安装！please{:10_512:}

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
http://sourceforge.net/projects/ ... od_v71.zip/download

装了modloader，然后把这个下载的zip扔mods文件夹

replies.author: sjjklh
replies.txt_content:
strawmaine 发表于 2012-7-16 11:55 
http://sourceforge.net/projects/claysoldiersmod/files/ClaySoldiersMod_v71.zip/download

装了modloa ...
骚年，一批老版主都退了，你上吧

replies.author: sjjklh
replies.txt_content:
strawmaine 发表于 2012-7-16 11:55 
http://sourceforge.net/projects/claysoldiersmod/files/ClaySoldiersMod_v71.zip/download

装了modloa ...
软件版或者问答版吧  问答版你这吉祥物的身份肯定没问题的  软件版挂个撸飞就意味着软件版无人了
